entry.title: UVA Today Feature
entry.content: Andrew Balch was featured in a piece by UVA Today on the Dean’s Undergraduate Research Fellowship program! You can check it out here.
entry.summary: Andrew Balch was featured in a piece by UVA Today on the Dean’s Undergraduate Research Fellowship program! You can check it out here.

entry.title: Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness

link.title: Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness

entry.content: Our workshop paper “Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness for Users with Diverse Musical Backgrounds” by Jason Chin, Matt Clark, and Afsaneh Doryab has been accepted to the WellComp 2024 workshop at UbiComp.
entry.summary: Our workshop paper “Creating Emotion-Evoking Music to Communicate Wellness for Users with Diverse Musical Backgrounds” by Jason Chin, Matt Clark, and Afsaneh Doryab has been accepted to the WellComp 2024 workshop at UbiComp.

entry.title: Changing Your Tune
entry.content: Our paper “Changing Your Tune: Lessons for Using Music to Encourage Physical Activity” by Matt Clark and Afsaneh Doryab has been published in the Proceedings of the ACM on Interactive, Mobile, Wearable, and Ubiquitous Technologies (IMWUT).
entry.summary: Our paper “Changing Your Tune: Lessons for Using Music to Encourage Physical Activity” by Matt Clark and Afsaneh Doryab has been published in the Proceedings of the ACM on Interactive, Mobile, Wearable, and Ubiquitous Technologies (IMWUT).

entry.title: Congrats Matt Clark and Andrew Balch

link.title: Congrats Matt Clark and Andrew Balch

entry.content: PhD student Matt Clark recieved the computer science department’s Computer Science Gradaute Service Award, and Andrew Balch received an honorable mention for the undergradaute research award!
entry.summary: PhD student Matt Clark recieved the computer science department’s Computer Science Gradaute Service Award, and Andrew Balch received an honorable mention for the undergradaute research award!

entry.title: Virginia Commonwealth Cyber Initiative Symposium Poster Presentation

link.title: Virginia Commonwealth Cyber Initiative Symposium Poster Presentation

entry.content: Andrew Balch presented his poster on a smartphone-based spectrophotometer for Vitamin B12 quantification at the 2024 Commonwealth Cyber Initiative Symposium in Richmond, Virginia!
entry.summary: Andrew Balch presented his poster on a smartphone-based spectrophotometer for Vitamin B12 quantification at the 2024 Commonwealth Cyber Initiative Symposium in Richmond, Virginia!

entry.title: Matt Clark and Maria Cardei elected to Computer Science Graduate Student Group

link.title: Matt Clark and Maria Cardei elected to Computer Science Graduate Student Group

entry.content: PhD student Maria Cardei has been elected to serve as the Social Chair in UVA’s Computer Science Graduate Student Group. PhD student Matt Clark has been elected to serve as a co-general chair of the Computer Science Graduate Student Group.
entry.summary: PhD student Maria Cardei has been elected to serve as the Social Chair in UVA’s Computer Science Graduate Student Group. PhD student Matt Clark has been elected to serve as a co-general chair of the Computer Science Graduate Student Group.

entry.title: Presentation at UbiComp 2023
entry.content: Congratulations to Matt Clark for presenting the paper “Sounds of Health: Using Personalized Sonification Models to Communicate Health Information” at UbiComp 2023!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Matt Clark for presenting the paper “Sounds of Health: Using Personalized Sonification Models to Communicate Health Information” at UbiComp 2023!

entry.title: Link Lab Student Flashtalks
entry.content: Congratulations to Matt Clark for being selected as one of the Link Lab student flashtalk speakers for his work on Melodies!
entry.summary: Congratulations to Matt Clark for being selected as one of the Link Lab student flashtalk speakers for his work on Melodies!

entry.title: Welcome Maria Cardei and Sabit Ahmed

link.title: Welcome Maria Cardei and Sabit Ahmed

entry.content: We welcome Maria Cardei and Sabit Ahmed, two new computer science PhD student’s joining the HAI Lab.
entry.summary: We welcome Maria Cardei and Sabit Ahmed, two new computer science PhD student’s joining the HAI Lab.

entry.title: Personalization in Circadian Rhythm-Based Event Scheduling

link.title: Personalization in Circadian Rhythm-Based Event Scheduling

entry.content: Our lab’s 4th year System’s Engineering Capstoene “Personalization in Circadian Rhythm-Based Event Scheduling” by Prachi Sadekar, Jackson Baitinger, Sean Conway, Matt Clark and Afsaneh Doryab has been published in the 2023 Systems and Information Engineering Design Symposium (SIEDS).
entry.summary: Our lab’s 4th year System’s Engineering Capstoene “Personalization in Circadian Rhythm-Based Event Scheduling” by Prachi Sadekar, Jackson Baitinger, Sean Conway, Matt Clark and Afsaneh Doryab has been published in the 2023 Systems and Information Engineering Design Symposium (SIEDS).
